meaningMnemonic: You see a <radical>tree</radical> growing on a <radical>cliff</radical> and it has <radical>ten thousand</radical> <kanji>horse chestnut</kanji>s growing on it. These trees are rare, only grow on cliffs, and they always have exactly ten thousand horse chestnuts on each one.
readingMnemonic: You decide to take a bite of a <kanji>horse chestnut</kanji> because it looks yummy, and there are ten thousand, so it's not like anyone will notice. You crack it open and take a nice big bite to find out that it tastes like <reading>toe chee</reading>se (とち)! UHG! It's the worst thing you've ever tasted. Like hot, moldy toe cheese! Ewwww!
